jinngine.physics
Class DefaultDeactivationPolicy

java.lang.Object
  jinngine_t.physics.DefaultDeactivationPolicy
All Implemented Interfaces:
DeactivationPolicy
public class DefaultDeactivationPolicy
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeactivationPolicy

Default implementation of a de-activation policy. The policy uses a simple threshold on the kinetic energy to reason about the activity of a body.

Specified by:

deactivate

public void deactivate(Body b)
Description copied from interface: DeactivationPolicy
Deactivate the body b. This method is called by the Scene, to deactivate a body, rather than having the Scene accessing the Body state directly. This allows for policies to store more data in relation to deactivation, to apply more advanced heuristics.

Specified by:
deactivate in interface DeactivationPolicy
